meanings.sent1: The artist created a nondimensional painting that seemed to float off the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nondimensional object, trying to understand its unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The nondimensional puzzle had everyone scratching their heads in confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a nondimensional maze, impossible to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The nondimensional concept of time travel fascinated the students in the class.

meanings.definition: Not having any specific dimensions or units of measurement.
meanings.sent1: The nondimensional shape puzzled the mathematicians, as it did not fit any known geometric rules.
meanings.sent2: The team worked on the nondimensional model, trying to make sense of its abstract design.
meanings.sent3: The nondimensional recipe called for a pinch of magic and a dash of creativity.
meanings.sent4: His nondimensional personality made him stand out in a crowd of ordinary individuals.
meanings.sent5: The nondimensional music filled the room, transporting the listeners to another world.
